trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand" />, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand" /> events of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará os eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event is raised when the `Cancel` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> é gerado quando o `Cancel` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the `Delete` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> é gerado quando o `Delete` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event is raised when the `Edit` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> é gerado quando o `Edit` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> evento é gerado quando qualquer botão de um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você teste para quando um botão de comando específico é clicado e tomar as devidas providências programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é geralmente usado para lidar com os botões de comando personalizado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the `Update` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> é gerado quando o `Update` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to define event handlers for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> events of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.

trans-unit.source: This example specifies the event handlers declaratively, setting the event handler for each command property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo especifica os manipuladores de eventos declarativamente, definir o manipulador de eventos para cada propriedade do comando no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handlers and programmatically add them to the events in the `Page_Load` method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como especificar os manipuladores de eventos e programaticamente adicioná-los para os eventos de `Page_Load` método.
